titles: Modern reports, or, Select cases adjudged in the Courts of Kings Bench, Chancery, Common-pleas, and Exchequer since the restauration of His Majesty King Charles II collected by a careful hand.
author: Colquitt, Anthony.

England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publisher: Printed for T. Basset, J. Wright, R. Chiswell, and S. Heyrick,
